summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 60th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest; West 59th Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest; West 58th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; West 57th Street, from 9th Avenue Northwest to 34th Avenue Northwest; West 56th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; Market Street, from 24th Avenue Northwest to 28th Avenue Northwest; 32nd Avenue Northwest, from West 56th Street to West 59th Street; 8th Avenue Northwest, from West 59th Street to West 60th Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6131, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
